p: We prepared cDNA libraries from leaves or whole plants of 8-wk-old seedlings (n = 40), representing the native and introduced range of YST ( Table 1). Seeds from these populations were reared in a greenhouse at 25Â° and 16-hr day/8-hr night conditions in a 1:1 mixture of sand and potting soil. RNA extraction followed Lai et al. (2012) .
